analyzed: dhamma paccanīya anuloma duka duka paṭṭhāna pāḷi

original: Nasārammaṇaṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca sārammaṇo hetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
analyzed: na sa ārammaṇam na hetum dhammam paṭicca sa ārammaṇaḥ hetu dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi, ārammaṇe tīṇi, adhipatiyā ekaṁ …pe… purejāte āsevane ekaṁ …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: saṅkhitta hetuyā tīṇi ārammaṇe tīṇi adhipatiyā ekam pe purejāte āsevane ekam pe avigate tīṇi

original: Naanārammaṇaṁ nanahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca sārammaṇo nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi, ārammaṇe ekaṁ …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: na anārammaṇam na na hetum dhammam paṭicca sa ārammaṇaḥ na hetu dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā tīṇi ārammaṇe ekam pe avigate tīṇi
